analyzed: yatra te vāsinaḥ siddhāḥ vimalāḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: tataḥ sa ṛca uddhṛtya ṛgvedaṃ samakalpayat /

ākhyānaiḥ ca api upākhyānaiḥ gāthābhiḥ kalpaja uktibhiḥ

śatena uddhata vīryaḥ tu ṛtvigbhiḥ vedapāragaiḥ

original: dve kṛtvā saṃhite caiva śiṣyābhyā madadādvibuḥ /

indrapramatiḥ ekām tu saṃhitām ṛṣi sattamaḥ

original: styasravasamagryaṃ tu putraṃ sa tu mahāyaśāḥ /
